incident.message: Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the `android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES` javadoc for details.

incident.message: Custom view `AnnotationView` overrides `onTouchEvent` but not `performClick`
Do not concatenate text displayed with `setText`. Use resource string with placeholders.
String literal in `setText` can not be translated. Use Android resources instead.
Hardcoded string "Back", should use `@string` resource
Hardcoded string "IMG Recognition", should use `@string` resource
Hardcoded string "Image for object recognition", should use `@string` resource
Hardcoded string "Recognition Results", should use `@string` resource
Hardcoded string "Start New Recognition", should use `@string` resource
Hardcoded string "App Logo", should use `@string` resource
Hardcoded string "IMG", should use `@string` resource
Hardcoded string "Image Recognition", should use `@string` resource
